name: Sparkle
description: A 2025 CiGA GameJam Work, a minimalist small game.
content:
"Sparkle"

It symbolizes brilliance, representing a sudden flash of inspiration in the mind, as well as the enlightening light of the soul.

In the game, players need to control the "aura" formed by the scattered stars, which constantly moves between different objects until reaching the destination.

Everything is alive and passes on the torch from generation to generation.
